website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling brand of quality training pants that many parents say are the best available. A must-have potty training tool for a good quantity and price.
pros: Designed like real underwear to help kids transition from diapers
Material is flexible and absorbent enough for most youngsters' needs
Comes in several sizes, a variety of fun character prints, and styles for boys or girls
Lots of pants for the price
cons: You may have to order up a size if your child is on the chunky side
Sides may rip after frequent pulling or tugging

customer_reviews.title: Anyone else think these were girls diapers based on picture of baby, and purple packaging?
customer_reviews.text: I'm a visual person so based on the packaging I bought this thinking it was girls diapers. The boy in the picture has sort of longer hair which can cause people to think this is girls diapers, and also misleading is the purple packaging. I know I should have read the description, but come on marketers get paid a lot to create packaging that portrays exactly what you're buying. And yes, there are differences in where the absorbent padding is located for girls vs boys.
customer_reviews.author: brian nanney

customer_reviews.title: Huggies quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for last 3 years and this is the only time I felt disappointed. The absorbency of this lot is quite poor compared to my previous purchases and it often leaks during night time. My son really likes the Mickey Mouse design and he never had any skin rashes with huggies and that’s why I always prefer this one over others. This is really easy for pant and potty training. I hope Huggies will maintain the product quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sailendra

customer_reviews.title: Finally! I have been waiting these! Good bye regular diapers!
customer_reviews.text: Pull Ups, Potty Training Pants, Size 12 - 24 months, 150 count. (One Month Supply) These ship in a case of 6 packages of 25 count diapers. They are perfect if your are tired of fighting your little one to put on size 5 or size 6 diapers. This will fit your baby and allow them to grow till its time for them to switch to the next size pull up. Also if your child is walking, this is a good way to start potty training early.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tedrow

customer_reviews.title: Horrible horrible
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this product I got a very nice quality diaper but this time around, I got a very horrible product from the seller. Are your product not suppose to be the same quality all around?? This diaper couldn't hold anything it doesn't matter when you put it on( leaks out the very moments put it on my son and it's very frustrating. ). it's worse than using a tissue as diaper. I will not be buying again from this seller becos of dishonesty.
customer_reviews.author: Enny Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Want to make potty training a breeze, pulls will be your new friend!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these pull ups! With some other brands we’ve tried, they have leaked causing more work of changing clothes or bedding. My son loves them and doesn’t miss a beat! Easy for him to take off and put on to help with the potty training process!
customer_reviews.author: Themomofboys

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big kids now
customer_reviews.text: I'm the grandmother have used pull up for starting children transferring from diapers to regular underwear for many years and several children. I have experienced it help a child grow into the idea of how everything works and makes training easier when they are ready
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Carter

customer_reviews.title: Only brand that fit my son.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only brand that will fit my son without tearing or hurting his legs. He also loves the Mickey ones more than the woody ones, so I always end up with just woody ones left lol
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Always A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: We've used these for a long time and prefer them over the other name brands. My son was disappointed that Toy Story wasn't on this order like it was from our local stores.
customer_reviews.author: CWalter

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: 2 yr old is not taking potty training well lol, these don’t hold up good at night so they’re only good for little accidents. He loved the inside of the box to color in though. And the Mickey Mouse
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Huggies is great
customer_reviews.text: I love Huggies Pull-Ups it's all I've used since my son was big enough to wear pull-ups I don't have no leaks with it I don't have no blowouts
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I will forever use huggies, newborn to pull ups and im on baby #3. Love having these delivered instead of taking up room in my shopping cart.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Irritated skin
customer_reviews.text: These would have been great except they irritated my grandson’s skin so much. He can’t use them because of the redness and irritation that wearing them caused him.
customer_reviews.author: DRS

customer_reviews.title: Quality material, very soft and absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Great and superiors than other brands. Nice and soft, perfect fit. They absorb water and hold it like crazy no seapage. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Tried & true product in our home. Super absorbent, comfortable for my son, fun character designs.
customer_reviews.author: Kali C.

customer_reviews.title: Pull-ups
customer_reviews.text: Bought as an alternative because other brand was unavailable. I will continue with this brand for now on.
customer_reviews.author: Dell518

customer_reviews.title: Size up!!
customer_reviews.text: These run small and don’t absorb as much as diapers do.
customer_reviews.author: MMartz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pull ups
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pull ups. They run a little small but they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jordana L

customer_reviews.title: Okay for up to 2 pees
customer_reviews.text: Diapers are fine for up to 2 pees not sure if i just got a bad batch or what but we use this brand frequently and ordered them online this time due to stores being low , diapers hold up to 1 to 2 pees but need to be changed very frequently even with potty training between.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Thacker

customer_reviews.title: All boxes not received
customer_reviews.text: This Client states All supplies were not received He received 2 boxes not 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great and my Great Grandson was so excited about them having Micky Mouse on them!! They are well padded and good stretch material. I would recommend them for potty training !!
customer_reviews.author: Tonjia Allman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these and my daughter likes the adjustable sides.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper in the store brands
customer_reviews.text: I do like these. It you can buy the same exact same thing in the Walmart brand or the target brand. And those are cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell!!!
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine but they have a very STRONG chemical smell. I can still smell it on his skin even when I took the diaper off my boy.
customer_reviews.author: Thanyavaran Thongpradit

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: They came in a box that you unfold and color grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Renea Harp

customer_reviews.title: The most important thing to know is make sure you get the right size
customer_reviews.text: Are use this product for my little girl she loves dollars plus the box she loved to she could color on the box
customer_reviews.author: Michael Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: It come fest and a good Quality Thank you so much this helps me so much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these pull-ups for my son months now. They are a must buy while potty training. Last for more then a month
customer_reviews.author: Justice

customer_reviews.title: Pull ups
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in perfect condition. Great value. Fits our grandson great! Highly recommend. Will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for night time accidents
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old boy still occasionally has night time accidents. Great value for the amount of product you receive.
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the sides. They come undone and aren't as durable as easy Ups brand
customer_reviews.author: Barbie21

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: No leaks, easy to pull down, sometimes the sides will come undone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and no leaks
customer_reviews.text: Love these pull ups. Great for night with no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Corcoran

product_meta.title: Pull-Ups Learning Designs Boys' Training Pants, 3T-4T, 112 Ct
product_meta.description: Size:3T-4T (112 Count)Make potty training easier with Pull-Ups Learning Designs Training Pants! Featuring refastenable easy-open sides, Pull-Ups training pants allow you to keep socks, shoes and pants on your toddler for quick changes on-the-go or at home. Pull-Ups Learning Designs provide outstanding protection & all-around coverage with soft, stretchy sides that fit like underwear and slide up & down to promote Big Kid independence. Pull-Ups disposable training pants also have adjustable sides to customize your child's waistband and easily check for messes, plus added absorbency where he needs it most. Each pack includes front & back designs of Disney's Mickey Mouse, with graphics that fade when wet to help him learn. When your child is ready to begin his potty training journey, the Pull-Ups brand can help. Visit pull-ups.com for expert articles, tips and potty training resources. We've helped train 50 million Big Kids and counting! Pull-Ups Learning Designs Boys' Training Pants are available in sizes 12-24M (14-26 lb.), 2T-3T (18-34 lb.), 3T-4T (32-40 lb.) and 4T-5T (38-50 lb.). Learning Designs now come in One Month Supply Packs, making it easy to buy in bulk and save with Subscribe & Save. (vs. training in diapers)
feature_bullets: All-around coverage with extra absorbency & leak protection where your child needs it most
Easy-open sides let you keep clothes on your toddler for quick changes on-the-go or at home
Soft, stretchy sides that move up & down easily to promote Big Kid independence
Customize your child's waistband and easily check for messes with Pull-Ups' refastenable sides
Exclusive graphics of Disney's Mickey Mouse that fade when wet to help your child learn
